actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1113.
Measure laid on table, S. 2973 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Public Works and Transportation with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1113) Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize to be appropriated to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, sums not to exceed $4,200,000 for the fiscal year 1979.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
